prompts: /workflows:spec-designer review the project at @observatory-mocha-demo/ --> the backend doesn't matter at all. this is a mockup of a new UI for the HTTP observatory that we're serving over websockets. I want you to pay attention to which libraries are used and how they're integrated into the HTML, then write a specification describing how we could implement the UI in our Thoughtbox server's WS-served observatory for the reasoning process the agent using it is executing, which I can look at in a browser.
